formName: Set up or disband a Gaming Duty group
description: Apply for group treatment for Gaming Duty purposes

sections.title: What do you want to do?

choices: Set up a Gaming Duty group

sections.title: Are you the representative member of the group?
You cannot set up or disband a Gaming Duty group

fields.infoText:
You must be the representative member to set or disband a group for Gaming Duty. 

The representative member of the group will need to do this another time. They can do this on GOV.UK.

sections.title: Is each member of the group a corporate body?
Is each member of the group either resident or established within the UK or Isle of Man?

fields.helpText: This must include the representative member

fields.label: mustberepmember
fields.infoText: You must be the representative member of the group.

fields.label: Email address
fields.helpText: Provide your email address below if you consent to communicating by email

sections.title: Enter the number of members the group will have

fields.label: Date you would like this to take effect?

fields.infoText: 90 days notice is usually required and applications will not be allowed retrospectively

sections.title: What date will this change take place?

fields.infoText: You must ususally give 90 days' notice.

fields.label: Is the trading name used by the controlling individual/body different from the name(s) given above?

choices: I declare that all information on this form and on any accompanying documents is correct and complete
I understand that all members of the group will be jointly and severally liable for Gaming Duty due from the representative member for the period of existence of the group
